title: MUT3R: Motion-aware Updating Transformer for Dynamic 3D Reconstruction
summary: Recent stateful recurrent neural networks have achieved remarkable progress on static 3D reconstruction but remain vulnerable to motion-induced artifacts, where non-rigid regions corrupt attention propagation between the spatial memory and image feature.
